title: joker_josue
author: joker_josue
created_time: March 21, 2023, 08:52:12 PMLast edit: June 10, 2024, 07:55:00 AM by joker_josue
content: Service Develop Excel Files      No macros, scripts or add-ons, just formulasPRESENTATIONI present my Excel file development service, using only formulas, without resorting to macros, scripts, add-ons, or other extra tools.The idea is to create Excel files that allow you to gather the necessary information, process it, and present it simply and practically, allowing you to save hours of repetitive work or compiling information.Using only standard Excel formulas, I will be able to assemble a file that will allow me to compile and present the desired information, in a simple, practical, and quick way to my clients.WHAT CAN I DOMake semi-automated scales, reducing a few hours of work.File that compiles data automatically, to be easier for the user to read.Files that convert information into BBCode format to make it easier to implement the information in the forum.Obtain information from a website (indicated by the customer) and compile that information in the intended form.And more...HOW IT WORKSThe Microsoft 365 Excel program is used, legal, and updated.I don't use macros, add-ons, or scripts, just native formulas.If the customer authorizes it, it will be possible to collect information directly from a website/online DB chosen by the customer.If the customer wants, the official "Excel data types" function can be used.Prepare file for making forum posts with BBCode.Communication via DM or Telegram.I only accept payments in Bitcoin.I do not accept works with illegal, sexual, xenophobic, racist, or similar content.PORTFOLIOLeaderboard in BBCode (2023)File that puts the league table in BBCode, of the Portuguese football league, just copy the information in Excel and paste it in the post. Update done in just 1-2 minutes weekly.[Link v1][Link v2]BBCode for the BSFL competition (March/2023)Development of the excel file, which allows semi-automatically compiling competition information into BBCode, creating a better presentation of information to readers while saving hours of work for creators.[Link]Subscription Campaigns Spreadsheet (March/2023)Creation of a new, more automated spreadsheet for the user Royse777.[Link]Crypto Personal Portfolio Registration (20/04/2023)Development of an Excel file, with the objective of registering purchases/sales of the crypto portfolio, showing the current quotation of the chosen coin and the overall performance of the portfolio.Ordered by: paid2[Image1] [Image2]Rollbit.com - Champions League Pool (23/09/2023)Development of a file to calculate the points for each game day and the Leaderboard.[Link]Analysis of the Bitcoin Difficulty Cycle (28/01/2024)Compilation of data on mined blocks, obtained through various websites, which describes the number of blocks mined by each pool with various information.[Link]

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: Nice to see you opening the thread. Love to see new ideas and services on the forum.I can confirm that excel file joker_josue built for us works as advertised. I was skeptical from the begging and he needed some time to tweak everything to our requirements but final product does everything we demanded from it. Scraping the data from internet source works perfectly and saves me time on weekly bases.If you have any need for product like this I can only recommend joker_josue. Also easy to work with which is always important

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: joker_josue on March 21, 2023, 08:52:12 PMSubscription Campaigns Spreadsheet Creation of a new, more automated spreadsheet for the user Royse777.[Link]It's an impressive template to work. I am a spreadsheet newbie but this template feels me I am a pro LOLI will highly recommend joker_josue excel file development service.Good luck buddy.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Just popping in here to leave a belated review of this service, which I engaged for this (ongoing) event: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408229.In summary, 50 participants submit responses collected with Google Forms. Depending on football match outcomes, they earn points. Josue created an excel sheet with minimal intervention. One only needs to:- enter the match outcomes- paste a portion of responses from playersThe Excel automatically tallies points by stage, as well as a compiled leaderboard. The working version is linked in OP of the thread I shared above.As a bonus, Josue is communicative, pleasant to work with and charges a fair rate. This not even acknowledging his being an asset to the forum. Highly recommended!

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: joker_josue on March 21, 2023, 08:52:12 PMLeaderboard in BBCode (2023)File that puts the league table in BBCode, of the Portuguese football league, just copy the information in Excel and paste it in the post. Update done in just 1-2 minutes weekly.[Link v1][Link v2]I updated the way the league table is now presented in BBCode. I also added more elements and information to include in the post, where everything is handled in the excel file in just 2 minutes or less.See the result here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462153.msg62697404#msg62697404https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462153.msg62711573#msg62711573

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: DanielleRam on October 25, 2024, 12:29:02 PMI once needed to create a bunch of reports for a project without using any fancy scripts, and I thought it would be a hassle. But once I got started, I found that simple formatting and organizing could really make a difference.If you need help with any of your projects, we can talk, and I will be happy to help.
